reviewText:
Early Access Review

I've played this since it's a flash game, and glad to see it's still being improved. overall a good twin stick shooter, but the diffuculty is too hard, and no support for 360 controller is definitely to put some new users down,

The price for this game is very reasonable, if you like twin stick shooters, this is a must have.

Early Access Review\n\nI've played this game since my childhood, revisiting it every year or so to play it again, so seeing it in early access is wonderful. The controls are simple to use and the music and visuals are very nostalgic. If you've played the original game, probably one of the best and most notable things that they've done to update it so far is allowing for 8-directional shooting (up from the original 4-directional).

reviewText: Early Access Review\n\nGreat little shooter game fun while it lasts and quite fair. However the length of the game compounded by its rigid level structure leave it with relatively minimal replayability. I think the best comparison i can make is 5 gum, its amazing for a short period before becoming very bland quite suddenly. Dont get me wrong, this is one of my favorite games from my childhood but its just not big enough. 7.5/10
Early Access Review\n\nQuite possibly the best Twin Stick Shooter and Work Commute Simulator hybrid ever released.

reviewText:
Early Access Review

Ten years ago, this was an excellent twinstick space-themed shooter.

Today, it's an excellent twinstick space-themed shooter with a few quality-of-life improvements, and Steam achievements, and the promise of some new shiny things in the near future.

Totally worth the purchase - it's that great combination of challenging and fun, so you'll not immediately lose interest but also not beat it in a single half-hour session.
